def_cn: 合宜;得体;正派;合乎礼仪
def_en: Decency is the quality of following accepted moral standards.

def_cn: （出于礼貌）应该做（但没做）…
def_en: If you say that someone did not have the decency to do something, you are criticizing them because there was a particular action which they did not do but which you believe they ought to have done.
